Detailed Description

this file contains all the definitions of the BQ76PL536 devices.

Author:
Daniel T. & Marcin N. Texas Instruments, Inc
Date:
November 2010
Version:
1.0 Initial version
Note:
Built with IAR for MSP430 Version: 5.10
